root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 5-5-2, translated into en
root.data: Goal 5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls5.5 Ensure that women participate fully and effectively in leadership functions at all decision-making levels, in political, economic and public life, and have access to them on an equal footing5.5.2. % of women in decision-making positions (Minister, Provincial Governor, Communal Administrator% Provincial Governor, Communal Administrator)GOVERNMENT SECRETARIATGovernment websiteGovernment websiteConsultation of the bulletin or the Government websiteN / AN / AN / AN / AN / AThe indicator is relevant because it provides information on the appointmentsThe update of the indicator results from the site feedNumber of Women Ministers, Governors, Municipal Administrators divided by the total number of Municipal Ministers, Governors or Administrators, multiplied by 100N / AAvailable at national level (Ministers; Governors; Municipal administration)N / AGovernment website
